elements.html: Please read each statement and choose the option which indicates how much the statement applied to you over the past week. There are no right or wrong answers. Don’t spend too much time on any statement.

elements.name: question1
elements.title: I found it hard to wind down.
choices: Did not apply to me at all
Applied to me some degree, or some of the time
Applied to me a considerable degree, or a good part of the time
Applied to me very much, or most of the time

elements.name: question2
elements.title: I was aware of dryness of my mouth.
choices: Did not apply to me at all
Applied to me some degree, or some of the time
Applied to me a considerable degree, or a good part of the time
Applied to me very much, or most of the time

elements.name: question3
elements.title: I couldn't seem to experience any positive feeling at all.
choices: Did not apply to me at all
Applied to me some degree, or some of the time
Applied to me a considerable degree, or a good part of the time
Applied to me very much, or most of the time

elements.name: question4

Applied to me some degree, or some of the time
Applied to me a considerable degree, or a good part of the time
Applied to me very much, or most of the time
